Reviews.Title: 5 star excellent camera but poor documentation
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Ehrlich
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent.  Well built, great image, terrific IR (at least 100').  Has a lot of features and very impressive for the money.  However, because it is built like a battleship, it is large and heavy.  If you have an application where you want the camera to be small and inconspicuous, buy some other camera. I took off one star because the documentation is poor beyond belief.  There is one sheet and it assumes you know how to use an EFFIO-E camera.  Doesn't mention how to access the onscreen menu (the controller is on the end of the cable pigtail).  Nor is there any explanation for the various parameters that can be set.  The camera seems to have the ability to detect motion but I have no idea how this would be communicated back to the DVR.  Also not mentioned is the focus and zoom controls (which are on the bottom of the camera).  They also provide a small allen wrench, but I have no idea what this would be used for (some internal fine adjustment I would guess.  It's a shame that such a beautiful camera has such poor documentation.  The importer of this camera should have taken ten minutes to add their own cheat sheet for their margin.  I blame the importer, not the manufacturer (the Chinese, I have found, do not understand the need for detail documentation and are somewhat embarrassed by their English skills.  They shouldn't be.  They can write English a lot better than I can write Chinese!) In any case, I plan to buy one or two more.  I would ignore the negative review.  It's completely off base.  I have three degrees in electrical engineering and I know a good piece of equipment when I see one.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Barry Fonseca
Reviews.Content: I needed a camera to replace our webcam over looking Newport Harbor. It looks great both in daylight and at night. Look for yourself on our website: [...]

Reviews.Title: Great Camara
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera 2 weeks ago and the performance is great. They are very clear and the colors are very clear. I have them set up with a GeoVison card. I have them installed with enough light at night so I cant really say how it would look at night, but great product and I recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Poor customer service!
Reviews.Author: rhinsb
Reviews.Content: I finally installed this camera after purchasing in April. It worked OK for about 20 minutes then went to black screen.No response after 2 emails. I'm going to try Amazon for help.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: ronald szymaszek
Reviews.Content: when i set this up i noticed my q-see supply didn't have enough power, after switching to a 1 amp. supply i even get color at night. A very crisp picture , with excelent night vision distance. would concider buying more of these.GW Security Professional Surveillance Video 700TVL CCTV Outdoor Security Camera - 1/3-Inch Sony Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices, 700 TV Lines, 2.8-12mm Varifocal Lens, 72pcs IR LED, 164ft IR Distance. (Black)!

Reviews.Title: Good Response from GW Security
Reviews.Author: Dayna Atkinson
Reviews.Content: I had a problem initially however the folks at GW Security responded promptly and resolved the issue the same day I reported it.  I would definetly purchase from GW security again.

Reviews.Title: Would buy again
Reviews.Author: Gecko
Reviews.Content: This camera is tons better than the camera that came with the DVR. It lights up the yard pretty well. I'd give night vision 7/10 which is really good considering the price. The lens adjustments are excellent as well. This is definitely a good buy. Using for about 3 months

Reviews.Title: Not bad if it Works
Reviews.Author: Don in Oakville
Reviews.Content: IR Range and 12mm field of view are great. Solid case construction but larger than similar outdoor cameras. Bought two units, one would not switch properly to night vision and was returned for refund. Manual zoom and varifocal controls are not accurate. Zoom is very limited. Manual is terrible, does not explain anything about the manual controls or the OSD setup options. I had to search on the Effio-E CCD to get any help with the OSD settings.

Reviews.Title: Second one.
Reviews.Author: Norman F.
Reviews.Content: Works well, this one has a small control button on the video cable that brings up a menu on my dvr monitor, not sure of the reason for it yet but picture is good.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding camera but....
Reviews.Author: Michael Austin
Reviews.Content: I just got through writing a very positive feedback to the seller, then I went back to the Amazon sight and noticed that this camera is supposed to be varofocal - I don't recall seeing any adjustments such as those shown in the picture. BUT, I don't care because far and away this is the best camera I've used to date. Night vision is outstanding - I don't know about the 164' claim but it's damn good. Both day and night clarity is great. I bought this $90 unit to replace an older $300 unit which finally quit on me but there is just no comparison between the two - the new unit blows away my old one. I may have to try and dial down the IR (if I can) as it's so bright I might end up burning a hole in my neighbors lawn. LOL

Reviews.Title: It's a great camera
Reviews.Author: T. Nofziger "Tyler Traveler"
Reviews.Content: I've purchased dozens of cameras in the past 6 months and this one is easily the best.  It's a good value and has an incredible stat-sheet for the money.  Most of the large companies don't offer 700 TVL but instead have closer to 500-600 TVL.  Every 100 TVL jump up is noticeable.  The IR is great as well.

Reviews.Title: no way these cameras are 700tvl
Reviews.Author: dilman yasin
Reviews.Content: the quality on these cameras are no where near advertised and 2 of the 3 I bought stop working 4 weeks after purchase

Reviews.Title: Very bad camera
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This camera was very bad camera and very bad durability,it did not last 3 minutes ,the image became a gray like a negative, during the night it's completely blurry.  Don't buy this camera.I contact the seller and no response was received. No warranty offered. Complete loss. I don't recommend this camera. Please save your moeny.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Giuseppe
Reviews.Content: I purchased these cameras thinking they they would zoom from the description.  I couldn't figure the zoom out, nor did the owner's manual describe the procedure.  The picture is terrible, do not buy.

Reviews.Title: Worked great for about a month
Reviews.Author: John R. Warren
Reviews.Content: Camera worked great for about a month.  Now it wont power on at all.  I tried diffrent cables that wont on my other cameras.

Reviews.Title: Does not work in low light
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace one that burnt out. This camera came with no information and does not work in low light at all.

ProductInfo.Features:
OSD/2D-DNR/BLC/Privacy Masking
Zoom & focus outside adjusting
Suitable for wall & celling installing
